hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that :the Messenger of Allah (saas) said: "Seek refuge with Allah from poverty, insufficiency and humiliation, and from wronging (others) and being wronged

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا تَعَوَّذَ مِنْهُ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: What The Messenger Of Allah Sought Refuge From
